extinction.description: the extinction factor of the fog

phaseG.description: G phase function describes how much forward (g<0) or backward (g > 0) light scatters around

attenuationExponent.description: defines how much the fog scattering and extinction gets attenuated near the edges of the shapes

op.description: defines how this fog area will behave with the global fog

minDistance.description: the distance at which the volumetric fog should start rendering

maxDistance.description: the max distance the volumetric fog will be displayed

depthExponent.description: the depth exponent used to render volumetric fog

noiseDensityOffset.description: the offset inside the noise texture

noiseDensityScale.description: the scale of the sampling inside the noise texture

noiseDensityIntensity.description: the intensity of the noise in the final render

noiseDensityMaxDist.description: the maximum depth at which density noise will be applied before being progressively reduced

volumetricSettings.description: it is highly recommended to customize these settings depending on your scene
